text: The Steel Plant Employees Union (SPEU) is a trade union at the Visakhapatnam Steel Plant in Visakhapatnam, India. SPEU is affiliated to the Centre of Indian Trade Unions. The SPEU general secretary is V. Dhanaraju. ==References== Category:Trade unions of the Visakhapatnam Steel Plant Category:Centre of Indian Trade Unions
title: Steel Plant Employees Union
